roleset.name: natural disaster: wildfire in brush
roleset.note: BRUSHFIRE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to wildfire, bushfire, fire-n.02. (from brushfire.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: brushfire-n: args 2, LOC
example.text: Firefighters continue to battle 320 acre brushfire in Ka'u.
